[Home](./index.md) &gt; [@here/harp-text-canvas](./harp-text-canvas.md) &gt; [TextCanvas](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.md)

## TextCanvas class

three.js text rendering engine which can manage and render high-quality, transformable, stylable and properly layout SDF and MSDF text.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class TextCanvas 
```

## Constructors

|  Constructor | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [(constructor)(params)](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas._constructor_.md) |  | Constructs a new <code>TextCanvas</code>. |

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [backgroundMaterial](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.backgroundmaterial.md) |  | THREE.Material | Currently active text background rendering material. |
|  [fontCatalog](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.fontcatalog.md) |  | [FontCatalog](./harp-text-canvas.fontcatalog.md) | Currently active \[\[FontCatalog\]\]. |
|  [material](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.material.md) |  | THREE.Material | Currently active text rendering material. |
|  [maxGlyphCount](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.maxglyphcount.md) |  | number | Maximum amount of glyphs each \[\[TextCanvas\]\] layer can store. |
|  [minGlyphCount](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.minglyphcount.md) |  | number | Minimum amount of glyphs each \[\[TextCanvas\]\] layer can store. |
|  [textLayoutStyle](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.textlayoutstyle.md) |  | [TextLayoutStyle](./harp-text-canvas.textlayoutstyle.md) | Currently active text layout style. |
|  [textRenderStyle](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.textrenderstyle.md) |  | [TextRenderStyle](./harp-text-canvas.textrenderstyle.md) | Currently active text rendering style. |

## Methods

|  Method | Modifiers | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [addLayer(layerId)](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.addlayer.md) |  | Creates a new <code>TextCanvas</code> rendering layer and returns. If there was already a layer for the input <code>layerId</code>, it just returns this one instead. |
|  [addText(text, position, params)](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.addtext.md) |  | Adds the input text to this <code>TextCanvas</code> in the specified screen position. The current \[\[TextRenderStyle\]\] and \[\[TextLayoutStyle\]\] will influence the results of this function. |
|  [addTextBufferObject(textBufferObject, params)](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.addtextbufferobject.md) |  | Adds a previously created \[\[TextBufferObject\]\] to the <code>TextCanvas</code>. Additional parameters can be provided to override the attributes stored in the buffer. |
|  [clear()](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.clear.md) |  | Clears all the placed glyphs in this <code>TextCanvas</code> (as well as resetting the current style). |
|  [createTextBufferObject(text, params)](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.createtextbufferobject.md) |  | Creates a new \[\[TextBufferObject\]\]. The computed text vertex buffer is equivalent to the result of performing the <code>addText</code> function for the input text in the screen origin. |
|  [getAllLayers()](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.getalllayers.md) |  | Retrieves all <code>TextCanvas</code> rendering layers. |
|  [getLayer(layerId)](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.getlayer.md) |  | Retrieves a specific <code>TextCanvas</code> rendering layer. |
|  [getMemoryUsage(info)](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.getmemoryusage.md) |  | Update the info with the memory footprint caused by objects owned by the <code>TextCanvas</code>. |
|  [measureText(text, outputBounds, params)](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.measuretext.md) |  | Returns the computed bounding box for the input text. The current \[\[TextRenderStyle\]\] and \[\[TextLayoutStyle\]\] will influence the results of this function. |
|  [pickText(position, callback)](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.picktext.md) |  | Executes the <code>pickCallback</code> for all previously stored picking data for text covering the specified screen position. |
|  [render(camera, target, clear)](./harp-text-canvas.textcanvas.render.md) |  | Renders the content of this <code>TextCanvas</code>. |
